Content Design

Slides

Content is king, a phrase we have all heard before but what does that mean when designing interfaces? How does content play a role in the design of an interface?

There's a famous story that Microsoft tested the effectiveness of its error messages by showing one that said, "There's a $50 bill taped under your seat", and at the end of the usability test, the fifty was still there. #PeopleDontRead

Very nice UX trick!

When you send an SMS with a confirmation code, make sure the code goes somewhere in the beginning.

This way users won't need to open the SMS from push notification to see the code. üëç
